summary: Provides functionality to generate and dispatch email alerts to CKAN users about new activities appearing in their dashboard activity stream. It gathers relevant activity data, formats it using Jinja templates, optionally parses time intervals, and sends the composed messages via the CKAN mailing system.
business_intent: Keep users informed of recent platform activity that concerns them, encouraging engagement and awareness by delivering timely email updates about changes, uploads, or discussions related to datasets and organizations.
